ERRORMSG_1:
It seems like, the Spritesheet is not in 'SD:/LeafEdit/'.
You can download the Spritesheets through Universal-Manager,
Or manually under the extras Repo of Universal-Team inside
'builds/LeafEdit/Spritesheets.zip/7z'.
ERRORMSG_2:
The easiest way is: To download Universal-Manager
And then go to 'Updater', 'UNIV' and then click on
The version you want. It automatically checks, if the files are found.
Keep in mind -> You need a Internet Connection to download this!
BACKUP_FILES: Facendo il backup dei file, aspettare...
DIRECTORY_EXIST_ALREADY:
Un salvataggio con lo stesso nome esiste già.
Sovrascrivere?
SECUREDATA_FIX_FAILED: Correzione del valore di sicurezza fallita!
NEW_PLAYER_NAME: Inserisci il nuovo nome del giocatore.
BACKUP_TOWN_POPUP: Do you want to Backup this Town?
REFRESH: Premi Start per Ricaricare il File Browser.
RESTORE_TOWN_POPUP: Do you want to restore this Town?
LAUNCH_TOWN_POPUP_A: Do you want to launch this Town?
DELETE_BACKUP_MSG: Would you like, to delete this Backup?
DELETE_GAME_SAVE:
Would you like, to delete this Game's Town?
Your Game will start directly after it.
BACKUP_BEFORE_RESTORE:
Fare un backup della città corrente
prima di ripristinare quella selezionata?
CONFIRM_OR_CANCEL: Press A to confirm or B to Cancel.
CORE_NLTK: - For the core part of NLTK.
SHOW_QR: Click here to show the QR Code.
WHAT_YOU_DO: What are you trying to do? :P
WANT_USE_INI: Do you want to use this ini?
WANT_EDIT_INI: Do you want to edit this ini?
CREATE_INI:
Are you sure, you want to create a new ini?
It will reset the existing Ini File, if it already exist!
NEW_SHEET_NAME: Enter the name of the sheet.
CHANGE_INI_OPTION: Press L/R to change the ini option.
SELTEXT_COLOR:
> This is the Selector Text Color.

This is the Selector Text Color.
MESTEXT_COLOR: This is the Message Text Color.
BG_TOP_COLOR: This is the Top BG Color.
BG_BOTTOM_COLOR: This is the Bottom BG Color.
SAVE_INI: Would you like to save the Ini?
CHANGE_VILLAGER_LR: Press Left/Right to change the Villager.
SET_VILLAGER: Would you like to set this Villager?
VILLAGER_GROUP_DONT_START: The Villager Group don't start with this ID!
SAVE_INCORRECT_SIZE: Save file has an incorrect Size!
